title: Chickpea, red onion and tomato salad
ingredients: ['525g chickpeas, drained', '2 tablespoons chopped red onion', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 or 2 tablespoons finely chopped parsley', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', 'salt and pepper to taste']
